name: Moonga TCG
description:
Build your strategy, use your most powerful Spells and challenge your friends to become the Master of Moonga, the most mind-blowing and addictive card game you’ll ever play!

・Create the ultimate deck based on over 600 magical Spells to collect and trade!
・Be part of a thrilling community of thousands of players waiting for new opponents!
・Moonga Trading Card Game was N°1 in the RPG category of the Japanese AppStore!


WHAT PEOPLE SAY
***** “I can't put it down, GOTTA BE THE BEST!”
***** “If you like strategy or card games you will love this”
***** “Great game. Mix of strategy, collection, nice graphics. Well balanced. Thumbs up! ”


FEATURES
- Quick, intense and strategic battles!
- More than 600 amazingly illustrated Spells with weekly releases!
- Lots of tournaments with prizes to win!
- A personal profile with friends list, private messages and card trading options!
- Free daily gifts for regular players!
- Different modes to play with your friends or defeat players from all over the world!
- A Monthly Worldwide Leaderboard to designate the Master of Moonga!
- Gorgeous illustrations and user-friendly interface!

3G or WiFi connection required to play.

Download Moonga now and discover the most addictive and unputdownable strategic card game! You’ll also receive a FREE deck of cards as soon as you register!
